titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the James Hogg Collection
titlestmt.author: by Beinecke Staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday January 22, 2019 at 06:14
profiledesc.descrules: translation missing: en.enumerations.resource_finding_aid_description_rules.beinecke manuscript unit archival processing manual

did.unittitle: James Hogg collection

repository.corpname: Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library

did.abstract: Letters by James Hogg to various persons; one letter by Margaret Phillips Hogg and one by William Hogg; manuscripts of writings by James Hogg, including "Memoir of Burns," and "Tales of Fathers and Daughters by the Ettrick Shepherd"; one drawing of James Hogg.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Ongoing collection of documents acquired by gift and purchase from various sources. Type of accession (gift or purchase) and date of acquisition is noted in the box-and-folder list. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The James Hogg Collection is the physical property of the Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library, Yale University. Literary rights, including copyright, belong to the authors or their legal heirs and assigns. For further information, consult the appropriate curator.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: James Hogg Collection. General Collection, Beinecke Rare Book and Manuscript Library.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This finding aid was produced from previously existing cards in the Manuscripts Catalog, or from another inventory. All pertinent bibliographical information has been retained. If the collection also contains unlisted or unsorted material, it has been noted in the box-and-folder list. This finding aid will be updated periodically to account for new materials that may be added to the collection. The date of the most recent update is noted on the title page. For information on material that may have been added since the last update, please consult the Public Service Desk.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: Microfilm available for manuscript items: "Julia M'Kenzie" (bound with "Wat Pringle o' the Yair") [folder 49] and "Mary Montgomery" [folder 25].

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This finding aid encompasses accessions of single manuscripts and small groups of manuscripts and other papers, by or pertaining to James Hogg, which the library has chosen to group and list as an artificial collection. Materials incorporated into the collection prior to June 1997 have been organized into 2 series. The first series contains items given to the library in 1931 by R. B. Adam. The second series contains subsequent gifts from other parties and purchases. Materials added to the collection since that time are located in Series III, Additions since June 1997, listed in the order in which they were added.
